docTitle.titlePart:
Die Viskositätsabhängigkeit der Fluoreszenz-
Anisotropie und der Lebensdauer von Trans-Stilben *

byline.docAuthor: M. Alicka, R. K. Bauer und A. Kawski

titlePage.byline: Luminescence Research Group , Institute of Physics , University of Gdansk , Poland Institute of Physics , N . Copernicus University, Toruri , Poland
titlePage.note:
Influence of Viscosity upon the Anisotropic Fluorescence and
Lifetime of trans-StUben

front.div:
The fluorescence anisotropy r and lifetime Tp of trans-
stilbene in different solvents has been measured and the
dielectric relaxation time from Perrin and Debye equations
has been determined. The fluorescence lifetime in the
viscosity region from 0.321 to 61.92 Nm _2 s, varies
between 30 and 152 ps.
Die mittlere Abklingzeit TF des trans-Stilbens in
